introduction: https://tinyurl.com/4wjt6van Here are your FREE English lessons, PDF cheat sheets and bonuses for Ju

vocabulary.definition: to increase or improve something, to make something better
vocabulary.example: She took a course to boost her confidence before the presentation.

vocabulary.definition: to become unresponsive, to have no reaction or response
vocabulary.example: His brain flatlined when he was asked a difficult question.

vocabulary.definition: able to speak or write a language easily, accurately, and confidently
vocabulary.example: After years of practice, she became fluent in Spanish.

vocabulary.definition: introducing or using new ideas, methods, or concepts
vocabulary.example: The company is known for its innovative approach to product design.

vocabulary.definition: small and easy to manage or digest, typically used to describe information or content
vocabulary.example: The online course offers bite-sized lessons that are perfect for busy learners.

vocabulary.definition: to come to an end, to no longer be valid or usable
vocabulary.example: Make sure to use the coupon before it expires at the end of the month.
